teal.render.viewer

Interface TViewer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasBoundingArea, HasID, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TViewer2D, TViewer3D
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractViewer3D, Viewer, ViewerJ3D

    public interface TViewer
extends HasBoundingArea, HasID
